front.title: Proposed Modifications to the Service Location Protocol, Version 2

abstract.t: SLPv2 [1] has been widely implemented but not all features of theprotocol are in common use. If these features were deprecated fromthe specification the protocol would be simpler, yet still performits core function. The changes proposed in this document could bethe basis for a revision of SLPv2 as it is considered for advancementto Draft Standard.
